name: Space N Stuff
description:
Context

Space N Stuff is another prototype I created for the 2nd semester ofd my Masters at the Heriot Watt University of Edinburgh. This prototype was made in under 2 weeks.

The theme of this prototype is "Optimization", that's why I chose to create a mobile game.

Gameplay

Space N Stuff is a mobile game.

In Space N Stuff you're playing a spacecraft and your sole purpose is to destroy the never ending waves of enemies.

Spawn. Kill. Die. Upgrade. Repeat.

This game is made to grind upgrades until reaching the most satisfying of games.

Team

Mathieu Schmerber: Programming, Art, Musics
